divs: Sighting Detailscoming from SFO to SAL after 1 hour of flight at the captains window I saw a bright light , it was steady yellow very bright , the captain was chatting with me ...but I was looking at this star like bright ligth , suddenly it intensity decreases , below it was a star 5 degrees above the horizon , in my phone I have a constellation map but I can not turn on my cell phone , that light was very high to be an acft on departure or app , because as an inernational rule lights are off above 10000 feet , we were leveled at FL 350 ...usually at that FL you see red , green , white navigation lights ...the light simply dims in a 5 mins period , after that in the 30 degree direction I just saw a very far away star or could be dimmed by the moonshine .
Summary: Flying thru central america in an A320 aircraft as FO , I saw that line in the direction of Phoenix ..
trends: There has been one other sighting in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around February 22nd 2013
